name: Advanced Retirement Planner
description: Professional-grade retirement planning with complete multi-currency integration
author: Yali Pollak (יהלי פולק)
features: Permanent side panel with tabbed navigation
Enhanced chart breakdowns showing all savings components
Complete multi-currency integration (ILS, USD, EUR, GBP, BTC, ETH)
Dynamic form labels with currency symbols
Real-time currency conversion and value updates
RSU stock price integration for 60+ companies
majorChanges: CRITICAL FIX: Monthly Income calculations no longer show NaN values
CRITICAL FIX: Monthly Income Real values now properly calculate inflation-adjusted amounts
CRITICAL FIX: Savings Rate calculation now works correctly with monthly salary inputs
CRITICAL FIX: Calculation Results panel no longer shows 'Error' for Total Savings and Monthly Pension Income
ENHANCED: Added missing monthlyIncome property to retirementCalculations return object
IMPROVED: SummaryPanel now correctly uses currentMonthlySalary for savings rate calculations
QUALITY: All dashboard display issues from screenshots have been resolved
STABILITY: Enhanced error handling and data validation across calculation components
